Parameters: Context: The new base context for this wrapper.
setBaseContext(android.content.Context).Description: Change the base context for this ContextWrapper. All calls will then be delegated to the base context. Unlike ContextWrapper, the base context can be changed even after one is already set.

ClassDesc: Special version of @B_android#content#ContextWrapper_E@ that allows the base context to be modified after it is initially set.
